title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Context-Based Personalized Mathematics Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and understanding of algebraic concepts
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical concepts to solve problems through real-world cases connected to their professional fields (medical/legal/technical)
Learners can acquire new mathematical knowledge using personalized contexts (sports, music, games, etc.) and integrate it into project deliverables
Learners can evaluate and improve the mathematical validity of context-based solutions through peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
